name: Pringles (itch)
description:
A survival game that let you play as a princess rabbit the main protagonist who finds herself in a really bad situation after encountering a mysterious creature. You will have to fight endless waves of enemies, choose buffs and debuffs and try to survive until the end.

(this game is made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam Experiences, Feel free to leave any comment on whatever you think about the game. so it could help me improve my skills:3)
